description: 下拉选择组件，点击选择器(select)展开下拉框(dropdown)，展示选择项(options)，兼容多个选择器的情况。

descriptionTags.en: Dropdown component, click the selector (select) to expand the dropdown box (dropdown), display the options (options), compatible with multiple selectors.
descriptionTags.name: 下拉选择菜单

defaultSelectIndex.description:
初始被选择的选择器的序号
@en The number of the selector that is initially selected
defaultSelectIndex.name: defaultSelectIndex

tags.en: The number of the selector that is initially selected

defaultSelectIndex.descWithTags: 初始被选择的选择器的序号

selectIndex.description:
(受控) 被选择的选择器的序号
@en The selected number of selector (controlled)
selectIndex.name: selectIndex
selectIndex.descWithTags: (受控) 被选择的选择器的序号

disabled.description:
选择器禁用状态
@en Selector disabled state
disabled.name: disabled

selectTips.description:
选择器的说明
@en Description of selectors
selectTips.name: selectTips

onSelectChange.description:
当选中的选择器改变的时候触发的回调函数
@en Callback when the selected selector changes
onSelectChange.name: onSelectChange

tags.en: Callback when the selected selector changes

onSelectChange.descWithTags: 当选中的选择器改变的时候触发的回调函数

icon.description:
选择器右侧的图标
@en Icon to the right of the selector
icon.name: icon

tags.en: Icon to the right of the selector

defaultShowDropdown.description:
初始状态,下拉框状态
@en Initial dropdown state
defaultShowDropdown.name: defaultShowDropdown

showDropdown.description:
可选受控，组件挂载时下拉框的状态
@en Optionally controlled, the state of the dropdown box when the component is mounted
showDropdown.name: showDropdown

tags.en: Optionally controlled, the state of the dropdown box when the component is mounted

showDropdown.descWithTags: 可选受控，组件挂载时下拉框的状态

onDropdownChange.description:
下拉框展示状态改变时触发的回调函数
@en Callback when displayed status of drop-down box changes
onDropdownChange.name: onDropdownChange

tags.en: Callback when displayed status of drop-down box changes

onDropdownChange.descWithTags: 下拉框展示状态改变时触发的回调函数

getContainer.description:
获得下拉框的容器
@en Get the dropdown box's container
getContainer.name: getContainer

chooseAndClose.description:
选择后是否收起面板，仅单选有效
@en Whether to close the panel after selection, only single selection is valid
chooseAndClose.name: chooseAndClose

tags.en: Whether to close the panel after selection, only single selection is valid

chooseAndClose.descWithTags: 选择后是否收起面板，仅单选有效

onCancel.description:
取消选择
@en Callback for cancelling selection
onCancel.name: onCancel

children.description:
自定义下拉框元素
@en Custom dropdown element
children.name: children

multiple.description:
是否支持多选
@en Whether to support multiple selection
multiple.name: multiple

options.description:
下拉框展示的选择项，其中级联选项仅单选支持
@en The options displayed in the dropdown box, in which the cascade option only supports single selection
options.name: options

tags.en: The options displayed in the dropdown box, in which the cascade option only supports single selection

options.descWithTags: 下拉框展示的选择项，其中级联选项仅单选支持

defaultValues.description:
初始选择项
@en initial selection item
defaultValues.name: defaultValues

values.description:
(受控) 每个选择器选中的项
@en (Controlled) The item selected by each selector
values.name: values

tags.en: (Controlled) The item selected by each selector

values.descWithTags: (受控) 每个选择器选中的项

renderSelectLabel.description:
自定义选择器
@en Custom selector
renderSelectLabel.name: renderSelectLabel

type.name: ((op: OptionsItem, index: number) => ReactNode) | ((op: OptionsItem[], index: number) => ReactNode)

onOptionClick.description:
点击选项时触发的回调函数
@en Callback when clicking option
onOptionClick.name: onOptionClick
onOptionClick.descWithTags: 点击选项时触发的回调函数

type.name: ((value: ReactText, item: OptionsItem, selectIndex?: number) => void) | ((selected: boolean, val: ReactText, item: OptionsItem, selectIndex?: number) => void)

onOptionChange.description:
选项改变时触发的回调函数
@en Callback when options change
onOptionChange.name: onOptionChange
onOptionChange.descWithTags: 选项改变时触发的回调函数

type.name: ((value: ReactText, item: OptionsItem, selectIndex?: number) => void) | ((vals: ReactText[], item: OptionsItem, selectIndex?: number) => void)

所有选择器选项总值改变时的回调函数

@en Format the input options

type.name: ((options: string[] | OptionsItem[][] | CascadeOptions[], values?: ReactText[]) => { formattedOptions: OptionsItem[][]; formattedValue: ReactText[]; }) | ((options: string[] | ... 1 more ... | CascadeOptions[], values?: ReactText[][]) => { ...; })

extraNode.name: extraNode
extraNode.description:
下拉框底部元素
@en Dropdown bottom element

bottom.descWithTags: 向上展开时下拉框出现的位置

height.name: height
height.description:
受控模式，下拉框高度
@en Dropdown box height in controlled mode

maxHeight.name: maxHeight
maxHeight.description:
下拉框最大的高度
@en The maximum height of the dropdown

clickOtherToClose.name: clickOtherToClose
clickOtherToClose.description:
点击其他区域是否取消选择

tags.en: Click on other areas to cancel the selection

clickOtherToClose.descWithTags: 点击其他区域是否取消选择

touchToClose.name: touchToClose
touchToClose.description:
是否在触发touchstart时就取消选择，否则在click之后再取消选择

tags.en: Whether to cancel the selection when touchstart is triggered, otherwise cancel the selection after the click

是否展示遮罩层

maskAnimationTimeout.description:
蒙层动画时长
@en Mask animation duration

maskAnimationFunction.name: maskAnimationFunction
maskAnimationFunction.description:
蒙层动画函数
@en Mask animation function

useColumn.name: useColumn
useColumn.description:
使用多列标签样式，传 true 为 4 列，传数字为指定 n 列
@en Use multi-column label style, input true, it's 4 columns, and input number n, it will be n columns

tags.en: Use multi-column label style, input true, it's 4 columns, and input number n, it will be n columns

useColumn.descWithTags: 使用多列标签样式，传 true 为 4 列，传数字为指定 n 列

optionIcon.name: optionIcon
optionIcon.description:
选项附带图标
@en Icon in each option

mountOnEnter.name: mountOnEnter
mountOnEnter.description:
是否在打开下拉框时再加载内容
@en Whether to reload the content when the dropdown box is opened

tags.en: Whether to reload the content when the dropdown box is opened

mountOnEnter.descWithTags: 是否在打开下拉框时再加载内容

unmountOnExit.name: unmountOnExit
unmountOnExit.description:
是否在退出时卸载内容
@en Whether to unmount content on exit

tags.en: Whether to unmount content on exit

unmountOnExit.descWithTags: 是否在退出时卸载内容

preventBodyScroll.name: preventBodyScroll
preventBodyScroll.description:
弹窗打开时是否禁止body的滚动
@en Whether to prohibit the scrolling of the body when the dropdown box is opened

preventBodyScroll.descWithTags: 弹窗打开时是否禁止body的滚动

initialBodyOverflow.name: initialBodyOverflow

defaultValue.value: 第一个全屏组件（弹窗、toast等）打开时页面overflow值

tags.en: The initial overflow state of the page, that is, the state in which overflow should be restored when the dropdown box is closed
tags.default: 第一个全屏组件（弹窗、toast等）打开时页面overflow值
tags.default_en: The page overflow value when the first fullscreen component (popup, toast, etc.) is opened

initialBodyOverflow.descWithTags: 页面初始 overflow 状态，即关闭弹窗时 overflow 应该还原的状态

getAnchorElement.name: getAnchorElement

defaultValue.value: 当前DOM所在位置的父元素

tags.en: Element used for positioning, with lower priority than top/bottom
tags.default: 当前DOM所在位置的父元素
tags.default_en: The parent element of the current DOM

getAnchorElement.descWithTags: 用于定位的元素，优先级低于top/bottom

isStopTouchEl.name: isStopTouchEl
isStopTouchEl.description:
点击某元素时是否阻止关闭面板, 优先级高于`getStopTouchElement`，当 clickOtherToClose=true 时有效
@en Whether to prevent the panel from closing when an element is clicked, the priority is higher than `getStopTouchElement`, valid when clickOtherToClose=true

tags.en: Whether to prevent the panel from closing when an element is clicked, the priority is higher than `getStopTouchElement`, valid when clickOtherToClose=true

isStopTouchEl.descWithTags: 点击某元素时是否阻止关闭面板, 优先级高于`getStopTouchElement`，当 clickOtherToClose=true 时有效

getStopTouchElements.name: getStopTouchElements

tags.en: Element that prevents the panel from closing, valid when clickOtherToClose=true
tags.default_en: The parent element of the current component

getStopTouchElements.descWithTags: 可阻止关闭面板的元素，当 clickOtherToClose=true 时有效

getScrollContainer.name: getScrollContainer
getScrollContainer.description:
内容内部滚动区域容器，在该容器中未滚动到顶部或底部时会释放滚动

getScrollContainer.descWithTags: 内容内部滚动区域容器，在该容器中未滚动到顶部或底部时会释放滚动

@en Get mounted container
